text: Dr. Dolittle 3 is a 2006 American comedy movie and a sequel to the 2001 movie Dr. Dolittle 2. The movie again stars Eddie Murphy in the title role of a doctor who can talk to animals, as well as Raven-Symon√© as his daughter. It was written by Larry Levin, one of the co-writers of Dr. Dolittle and directed by Steve Carr. Dr. Dolittle 3 was the second sequel of the franchise and the first Dr. Dolittle movie to be released directly to video. title: Dr. Dolittle 3
